entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Refactor "Remove parameter" mistakenly removes arguments with '@' #66547
    17.6
  • No `Protected` keyword completion after `Private` in VB #66544
    17.6
  • Enums & generic math #66542
  • Missing completion for raw string after typing `$$"""` #66538
    Backlog

Closed

  • IDE0060 shouldn't warn for throw-only methods #65275

PullRequests

Created

  • Inline Diagnostics - fix multiple empty line bug #66548
    Area-IDE
  • Add an API for the parsed command line back from an OptionsProcessor #66546
    Area-IDE
  • Correctly emit accessibility when generating properties via `SyntaxGenerator` #66543
    Area-IDE, Community
  • LocalRewriter.DecisionDagRewriter - Remove redundant field #66539
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement LSP codelens for reference counts #66537
    Area-IDE
  • Add VerifyMethodBody helper as a replacement of VerifyIL #66536
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Optimizer.StackOptimizerPass1 - Remove redundant field initializer #66540
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66534
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Prefer list-pattern for length-only counterexamples #66541
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Unused parameter analyzer shouldn't warn for methods that only throw #66535
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix analyzer loading to prefer host #66492
    Area-Compilers
  • Support emitting type-parameter variance in syntax generator #66446
    Area-IDE
  • Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Add serializer for bool?, enum, and enum? options #66526
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for brace pair highlighting for C# and VB (F#/TS can add support as well if desired). #66348
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for generating ref-members in SyntaxGenerator #66445
    Area-IDE
  • Promote regular item to "Preferred" state #66278
    Area-IDE
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Make SymbolDisplay show nullable enum values as enums #66528
    Area-Compilers
  • Block instrumentation improvements #66506
    Area-Compilers
